title: ReturnTerms
description: Specifies the type of return of a performance payout.

priceReturnTerms.description: Return terms based upon the underlier's observed price.

dividendReturnTerms.description: Return terms based upon dividend payments associated to the underlier.

varianceReturnTerms.description: Return terms based upon the observed variance of the underlier's price.

volatilityReturnTerms.description: Return terms based upon the observed volatility of the underlier's price.

correlationReturnTerms.description: Return terms based upon the observed correlation between the components of the underlying basket.
